attributes.action: Ensure that any one who abuses or injures a chils serves life in prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of child abuse is rife. Anyone abusing, injuring, at worst killing a child should spend the rest of their natural life in prison. It is or duty to protect these vunerable children. Please vote with compassion. Maybe the sentence will be a deterent. Thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
